price: 97 « Par Allah ! Nous étions de toute évidence égarés
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
